001package Tools;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
006
007
008public class Unlock_Image implements PlugIn {
009
010        public void run(String arg0) {
011                ImagePlus img = IJ.getImage();
012                if (img.isLocked()) {
013                        img.unlock();
014                        IJ.log("unlocked image");
015                }
016        }
017
018}
